Kobatela ya ba mashine mpo na bato ya boye esengaka kotya bafiltre ya makasi ya mopepe, kosala ete ba ventilateur ebaluka makasi, kotya biloko ekabolaka bato neti biloko oyo elekisaka te mopepe ya itche, mpe kotya madesu na fenetre mpo na baoyo bazoyamba bakiliya. Libateli ya bakonzi mpo na bituluku ya likama mingi ezosenga kolendisa bato ya mosala oyo bazobela batikala na ndako, kosala makita na internet na esika ya kozala na esika moko, kotya mibeko mpo na kolongola mibembo ezangi ntina na bisika oyo COVID-19 ezali, kosala mayele ya kosolola ata mpe ba forume mpo na kolandela mikakatano ya bato ya mosala, kopesa bato ya mosala bansango ya sika mpe formation ebongi mpo na makama ya COVID-19 mpe makambo ya kosala mpo na komibatela, kopesa formation na bato ya mosala oyo basengeli kosalela bilamba ya komibatela mpe koyebisa bango ndenge ya kosalela yango, kopesa bango bisaleli mpe basala na esika oyo eza peto, ezosenga kosokola maboko mbala na mbala, kosala ete bakiliya na bato mosusu bakotaka mingi te na esika ya mosala, mpe kotya bilembo ya kosokola maboko mpe bibongiseli mosusu ya komibatela na COVID-19. Na kotalela mosala bazosala, bato ya mosala oyo baza na likama ya katikati basengeli kolata bilamba na bango ya komibatela na ndakisa bagan, blouse, masque ya elongi, to maneti ya komibatela.
translated: Yango esangisi basali oyo bazali na boyokani na bato banso lokola na biteyelo, bisika ya mosala oyo ezali na bato mingi, mpe mwa bisika ya kotɛka na detalye oyo ezali na volume mingi.Ba contrôles ya ingénierie mpo na yango mpe bituluku ya makama mingi ezali na kotia ba filtres ya mopepe ya efficacité makasi, komatisaka ba taux ya ventilation , kotia ba barrières physiques lokola ba gardiens ya étouffement ya plastique ya polele, pe ko installer fenêtre ya drive-through pona service client.Ba contrôles administratifs pona oyo pe ba groupes ya risque makasi ezali kolendisa basali ya maladi ba vanda na ndaku, ko remplacer ba réunions face à face na ba communications virtuelles, kosala ba quarts échecs, kotika mibembo oyo ezali na ntina te na bisika oyo bokono ya COVID-19 ezali kokoba, kosala miango ya bopanzi sango ya lombango kati na yango forum ya koyanola na mitungisi ya basali, kopesa basali mateya mpe mateya ya sika na ntina ya makambo ya likama ya COVID-19 mpe bizaleli ya bobateli, kopesa mateya na basali oyo basengeli kosalela mpo na kobatela bilamba mpe bisaleli ndenge ya kosalela yango, kopesa biloko mpe esika ya mosala oyo ezali kolendisa bopeto ya moto ye moko, kosɛnga kosukola mabɔkɔ mbala na mbala, kopekisa bakiliya mpe bato nyonso bákɔta na esika ya mosala, mpe kotya bilembo oyo elobeli kosukola mabɔkɔ mpe makambo mosusu Mibeko ya bobateli COVID-19.Na kotalaka mosala ya mosala, basali oyo bazali na likama ya exposition ata moyenne bakoki kozala na posa ya kolata bisaleli ya komibatela na bango moko kati na yango mwa kosangisa ya ba gants, robe, nguba ya elongi to masque ya elongi, to ba lunettes.

sourceString: Workers in this risk group rarely require use of respirators.
targetString: Bato ya mosala oyo baza na etuluku oyo, esengaka mpenza te basalela biloko esalisaka na kopema.
translated: Basali oyo bazali na etuluku yango ya makama basengeli mbala mingi te kosalela biloko ya kopema.

sourceString: If a person becomes sick on an airplane, proper controls to protect workers and other passengers include separating the sick person from others by a distance of 6 feet, designating one crew member to serve the sick person, and offering a face mask to the sick person or asking the sick person to cover their mouth and nose with tissues when coughing or sneezing.
targetString: Soki moto moko abeli na avion, lolenge ya malamu ya kobatela bato ya mosala mpe bato mosusu ezali kokabola ye na bato mosusu na distance ya 6 pied, kopona moto moko ya equipage mpo akipe moto wana ya maladi, mpe kopesa masque ya elongi to kosenga moto wana ya maladi azipa monoko na zolo na ye na elamba ntango azokosola to azosala itche.
translated: Soki moto azwi maladi na mpɛpɔ, makambo oyo ebongi mpo na kobatela basali mpe bato mosusu oyo bazali na kati ya mpɛpɔ ezali ya kokabola moto oyo azali na maladi na bato mosusu na ntaka ya mɛtrɛ 10, kopona mosali moko ya masuwa mpo na kosalela moto oyo azali na maladi, mpe kopesa moto oyo azali na maladi masque ya elongi to kosɛnga moto ya maladi azipa monɔkɔ mpe zolo na ye na ba tissus ntango azali kosukosu to koswa.

sourceString: Cabin crew should wear disposable medical gloves when tending to a sick traveler or touching body fluids or potentially contaminated surfaces, and possibly additional personal protective equipment if the sick traveler has fever, persistent cough, or difficulty breathing.
targetString: Bato ya mosala oyo baza na cabine basengeli kolata bagan ntango bazosalisa moto azosala mobembo oyo azobela to kosimba mai ya nzoto to esika nyonso oyo ekoki kopesa bango maladi, mpe komibatela mingi lisusu soki moto yango ya maladi azobela fievre, kosukosu oyo ezosila te, to azopema na mpasi.
translated: Bato oyo basalaka na kabine basengeli kolata ba gants médicaux oyo ekoki kobwakama mbala moko ntango bazali kobatela mobembo oyo azali na maladi to kosimba mai ya nzoto to bisika oyo ekoki kozala na mikrobe, mpe mbala mosusu bisaleli mosusu ya komibatela soki moto oyo azali na maladi azali na fiɛvrɛ, kosukosu oyo ezali kosila te, to azali na mokakatano ya kopema.

sourceString: Gloves and other disposable items should be disposed of in a biohazard bag, and contaminated surfaces should be cleaned and disinfected afterwards.For commercial shipping, including cruise ships and other passenger vessels, hazard controls include postponing travel when sick, and self-isolating and informing the onboard medical center immediately if one develops a fever or other symptoms while on board.
targetString: Bagan mpe biloko mosusu oyo babwaka nsima ya kosalela esengeli kobwakama na esika ebongi, mpe bosengeli kopetola mpe kolongola mikrobe na bisika oyo ezwi mikrobe. Mpo na maswa ya mombongo, ata mpe bato de croisière mpe bato mosusu oyo baza nakati, komibatela elimboli koboya kosala mobembo soki ozobela, mpe komifandela mpe koyebisa minganga oyo baza nakati mbala moko soki moto moko oyo aza na kati aza na fievre to bilembo ya maladi mosusu.
translated: Esengeli kobwaka ba gants mpe biloko mosusu oyo ekoki kobwakama mbala moko na saki ya biohazard, mpe bisika oyo ezali na bosoto esengeli kosukola mpe ko désinfecter sima.Mpo na masuwa ya mombongo, bakisa mpe masuwa ya croisière mpe masuwa mosusu ya bato, ba contrôles ya makama ezali kozongisa nsima mobembo ntango ozali na bokono, mpe komitangola mpe koyebisa centre médical oyo ezali na kati ya masuwa mbala moko soki moto azwi fiɛvrɛ to bilembo mosusu ntango azali na masuwa.

sourceString: Ideally, medical follow-up should occur in the isolated person's cabin.For schools and childcare facilities, CDC recommends short-term closure to clean or disinfect if an infected person has been in a school building regardless of community spread.
targetString: Eza malamu kolandela santé ya moto wana ya maladi na esika oyo batye ye. Mpo na biteyelo to bisika ya kobatela bana, CDC ezosenga kokanga esika wana na ntango moke mpo na kopetola to kolongola mikrobe soki moto moko ya maladi azalaki na lopango ya eteyelo ezala maladi epanzani mingi to te esika bofandi.
translated: Na lolenge ya malamu, bolandi ya monganga esengeli kosalema na kabine ya moto oyo azali ye moko.Mpo na biteyelo mpe bisika ya bobateli bana, CDC epesi toli ya kokanga mpo na ntango mokuse mpo na kosukola to koboma mikrobe soki moto oyo azali na bokono azalaki na ndako ya eteyelo kozanga kotala kopalangana na lisanga.

sourceString: When there is minimal to moderate community transmission, social distancing strategies can be implemented such as canceling field trips, assemblies, and other large gatherings such as physical education or choir classes or meals in a cafeteria, increasing the space between desks, staggering arrival and dismissal times, limiting nonessential visitors, and using a separate health office location for children with flu-like symptoms.
targetString: Soki bokono ezopanza mingi mpenza te na kati ya bato, bokoki kosalela mayele ya kopekisa bato bakutana na ndakisa kopekisa mibembo, mayangani, mpe makita mosusu ya minene na ndakisa education physique to korale na biteyelo to kolya na restaurant, ata mpe distance ezokabola babiro, kozelazela na ntango ya koya to ya kokende, koboya bavisite ezangi ntina, mpe kosalela babiro ya minganga ekeseni mpo na bana oyo bazali na bilembo ya grippe.
translated: Tango transmission communautaire ezali moke to moyenne, ba stratégies ya distance sociale ekoki kosalelama lokola ko annuler ba voyages ya terrain, ba assemblées, pe ba réunions misusu ya minene lokola éducation physique to ba classes ya chorale to kolia na cafétéria, komatisaka espace entre ba bureaux, arrivée étonnante pe bolongolami na mosala mbala, kopekisa bapaya oyo bazali na ntina te, mpe kosalela esika ya biro ya bokolongono ekeseni mpo na bana oyo bazali na bilembo lokola grippe.

sourceString: When there is substantial transmission in the local community, in addition to social distancing strategies, extended school dismissals may be considered.For law enforcement personnel performing daily routine activities, the immediate health risk is considered low by CDC.
targetString: Soki maladi epanzani mingi esika bofandi, longola mayele ya koyebisa bato bamifandela, bokoki kokanga biteyelo mpo na ntango ya mwa molai. Mpo na bapolisi oyo bazosala mosala na bango bo momeseno, CDC elobi ete likama na bango eza na nivo ya se.
translated: Ntango bopanzani ya monene ezali na kati ya lisanga ya mboka, longola mayele ya kozala mosika na bato, bakoki kotalela bolongolami na kelasi na boumeli ya ntango molai.Mpo na basali ya mibeko oyo bazali kosala misala ya mokolo na mokolo, likama ya bokolongono ya mbala moko etalelami lokola moke na CDC.

sourceString: Law enforcement officials who must make contact with individuals confirmed or suspected to have COVID-19 are recommended to follow the same guidelines as emergency medical technicians, including proper personal protective equipment.
targetString: Bakonzi ya bapolisi oyo basengeli kokutana na bato oyo baza na COVID-19 to oyo bakoki kozala na yango, esengeli batosa mibeko ya ndenge moko na oyo minganga batosaka, ata mpe kolata bisaleli malamu mpo na komibatela.
translated: Bakonzi ya mibeko oyo basengeli kosala boyokani na bato baye bayebani to bakanisami ete bazali na COVID-19 basengeli kolanda malako ndenge moko na ba techniciens médicaux ya lombango, bakisa mpe bisaleli ya malamu ya komibatela.

sourceString: If close contact occurs during apprehension, workers should clean and disinfect their duty belt and gear prior to reuse using a household cleaning spray or wipe, and follow standard operating procedures for the containment and disposal of used PPE and for containing and laundering clothes.
targetString: Soki bosimba moto ntango bozokanga ye, bato wana basengeli kopetola mpe kolongola mikrobe na nkamba na bango ya mosala mpe na bisaleli na bango liboso ya kosalela yango, bakosala yango na lisalisi ya aspirateur mpe kolanda mibeko etali komibatela mpe kobwaka biloko oyo PPE epesi mpe ya kobatela mpe kosokola bilamba.
translated: Soki bokutani ya penepene esalemi na tango ya bokangami, basali basengeli kosukola mpe ko désinfecter ceinture ya mosala mpe biloko na bango yambo ya kosalela lisusu kosalela pulvérisation to epangusi ya bopeto ya ndako, mpe kolanda ba procédures ya fonctionnement standard mpo na kokanga mpe kobwaka PPE oyo esalelami mpe mpo na kokanga mpe kosukola bilamba.

sourceString: OSHA considers certain healthcare and mortuary workers to be at high or very high categories of exposure risk.
targetString: OSHA etalelaka bato mosusu oyo basalaka mosala ya monganga mpe oyo basalaka na morgue ete baza na likama makasi to baza na kati ya bato oyo baza na likama makasi.
translated: OSHA etalelaka basali mosusu ya bokolongono mpe ya bibembe lokola bazali na biteni ya likolo to ya likolo mpenza ya likama ya botalisami.

sourceString: High exposure risk jobs include healthcare delivery, support, laboratory, and medical transport workers who are exposed to known or suspected COVID-19 patients.
targetString: Misala ya likama makasi eza na ndakisa kobotisa, kosalisa, laboratoire, mpe bato oyo bamema bato ya maladi oyo baza na COVID-19 to bakoki kozala na yango.
translated: Misala ya risque ya exposition makasi ezali na bopesi soins de santé, soutien, laboratoire, mpe basali ya transport médicale oyo ba exposés na ba malades ya COVID-19 oyo bayebani to ba suspecter.

sourceString: These become very high exposure risk if workers perform aerosol-generating procedures on, or collect or handle specimens from, known or suspected COVID-19 patients.
targetString: Bakomaka na likama makasi soki bazosala misala ya aerosol, to bazozwa to bazosalela ba échantillon euti na bato oyo baza na COVID-19 to bakoki kozala na yango.
translated: Yango ekomi risque ya exposition ya likolo mingi soki basali basali ba procédures ya génération ya ba aérosols na, to ba ramasser to basimbaka ba échantillons ya, baye bayebani to ba suspecter ba maladi ya COVID-19.

sourceString: Aerosol-generating procedures include intubation, cough induction procedures, bronchoscopies, some dental procedures and exams, or invasive specimen collection.
targetString: Misala ya aerosol eza misala neti intubation, kosalisa kosukosu, bronchoscopie, to misala to ba ekzame mosusu ya mino, to kozwa ba écahntillon.
translated: Ba procédures oyo ebimisaka aérosol ezali intubation, procédures ya induction ya kosukosu, bronchoscopies, ba procédures mosusu ya mino mpe ba examens, to kozua échantillon invasive.

sourceString: High exposure risk mortuary jobs include workers involved in preparing the bodies of people who had known or suspected cases of COVID-19 at the time of their death; these become very high exposure risk if they perform an autopsy.Additional engineering controls for these risk groups include isolation rooms for patients with known or suspected COVID-19, including when aerosol-generating procedures are performed.
targetString: Likama makasi ya misala ya morgue etali bato oyo basalaka mosala ya kobongisa bibembe ya bato oyo bakufaki na COVID-19 na ntango bakufi to oyo bato oyo bakanisi ete bazalaki na yango; bazalaka na likama makasi soki basali ekzame na nsima mpo na koyeba soki bakufaki na maladi nini. Likama mosusu mpo na bango eza soki bazosalisa bato oyo baza na COVID-19 to oyo bakanisi baza na yango na bashambre na bango, ata mpe ntango bazosala misala ya aerosol.
translated: Misala ya mortuaire ya risque ya exposition makasi ezali na basali oyo bazali na kati ya kobongisa nzoto ya bato oyo bayebaki to bakanisaki ete bazali na bokono ya COVID-19 na tango ya liwa na bango; oyo ekomi risque ya exposition ya likolo mingi soki basali autopsie.Ba contrôles ya ingénierie ya kobakisa pona ba groupes ya risque oyo ezali na ba salles ya isolement pona ba malades oyo bayebani to ba suspecter COVID-19, y compris tango ba procédures ya génération ya aérosol esalemi.

sourceString: Specialized negative pressure ventilation may be appropriate in some healthcare and mortuary settings.
targetString: Kotinda mwa mopepe ya ventilateur ekoki kozala malamu na balopitalo mosusu mpe na ba morgue.
translated: Ventilation spécialisée ya pression négative ekoki kozala malamu na ba environnements mosusu ya soins de santé mpe mortuaire.

sourceString: Specimens should be handled with Biosafety Level 3 precautions.
targetString: Esengeli kosalela ba échantillon na kolanda nivo ya libateli ya bio 3.
translated: Esengeli kosimba ba échantillons na ba précautions ya Biosafety Niveau 3.

sourceString: The World Health Organization (WHO) recommends that incoming patients be separated into distinct waiting areas depending on whether they are a suspected COVID-19 case.In addition to other PPE, OSHA recommends respirators for those who work within 6 feet of patients known to be, or suspected of being, infected with SARS-CoV-2, and those performing aerosol-generating procedures.
targetString: Organisation mondiale de la santé (OMS) elobi ete eza malamu kokabola bato ya maladi na bisika ya kozela ekeseni na kotalela soki bozokanisa baza na maladi ya COVID-19 to te. Longola likanisi ya kosala biloko esalisaka na kopema oyo PPE, OSHA elobeli mpo na bato oyo bazosala na distance ya 6 pied na bato oyo bayebani baza na SARS-CoV-2, oyo bozokanisa baza na yango, to oyo bazwi yango, mpe kosala misala mosusu ya aerosol.
translated: Organisation mondiale de la santé (OMS) epesi toli ete ba maladi oyo bakoya bakabolama na bisika ya kozela ekeseni engebene soki bazali moto oyo bakanisaka ete azali na bokono ya COVID-19.En plus ya ba PPE misusu, OSHA epesi toli ya ba respirateurs mpo na baye basalaka na 6 feet ya ba maladi oyo eyebani ete bazali , to bakanisaka ete bazali, na bokono ya SARS-CoV-2, mpe baye basalaka misala ya kobimisa aérosol.

sourceString: In the United States, NIOSH-approved N95 filtering facepiece respirators or better must be used in the context of a comprehensive, written respiratory protection program that includes fit-testing, training, and medical exams.
targetString: Na États-Unis, biloko esalisaka na kopema N95 oyo endimami na NIOSH to ya malamu koleka esengeli kosalelama mingi na makambo ya komibatela na maladi ya mpema na ndakisa test ya ajustement, formation, mpe ba-ekzame ya monganga.
translated: Na Etats-Unis, esengeli kosalela ba respirateurs ya facepiece filtrant N95 oyo endimami na NIOSH to malamu koleka na contexte ya programme ya protection respiratoire ya mobimba, oyo ekomami oyo esangisi test ya fit-test, formation, mpe ba examens médicaux.

sourceString: Other types of respirators can provide greater protection and improve worker comfort.The WHO does not recommend coveralls, as COVID-19 is a respiratory disease rather than being transmitted through bodily fluids.
targetString: Lolenge mosusu ya biloko esalisaka na kopema ebatelaka mingi mpe esalisaka bato basala malamu. OMS endimaka te biloko ezipaka elongi mobimba, mpo COVID-19 eza maladi ya mpema mpe epanzanaka te na nzela ya mai ya nzoto.
translated: Lolenge mosusu ya ba respirateurs ekoki kopesa libateli mingi mpe kobongisa confort ya mosali.OMS epesi toli te ya ba couvertures, lokola COVID-19 ezali bokono ya mpema na esika ya kopesama na nzela ya mayi ya nzoto.

sourceString: WHO recommends only a surgical mask for point-of-entry screening personnel.
targetString: OMS ezosenga kaka kosalela masque ya minganga mpo bato oyo bazosalisa ba ekzame.
translated: OMS epesi toli kaka masque ya lipaso mpo na basali ya dépistage ya point d’entrée.

sourceString: For those who are collecting respiratory specimens from, caring for, or transporting COVID-19 patients without any aerosol-generating procedures, WHO recommends a surgical mask, goggles, or face shield, gown, and gloves.
targetString: Mpo na bato oyo bazozwa ba échantilllon ya maladi ya mpema na bato ya maladi, kobatela bango, to komema bato oyo bazobela COVID-19 kozanga kosala misala ya aerosol, OMS ezondima kosalela masque ya minganga, maneti ya libateli, to eloko ya kobatela elongi, blouse, mpe bagan.
translated: Mpo na baye bazali kozwa ba échantillons ya mpema epai na, kobatela, to komema ba maladi ya COVID-19 kozanga ata mayele moko ya kobimisa aérosol, OMS epesi toli ya kosala masque ya lipaso, ba lunettes, to nguba ya elongi, robe, mpe ba gants.

sourceString: If an aerosol-generating procedure is performed, the surgical mask is replaced with an N95 or FFP2 respirator.
targetString: Soki bosali misala ya aerosol, na esika ya masque ya minganga, bokosalela eloko esalisaka na kopema N95 to FFP2.
translated: Soki basali procédure oyo ebimisaka aérosol, ba remplacer masque ya lipaso na respirateur N95 to FFP2.

sourceString: Given that the global supply of PPE is insufficient, WHO recommends minimizing the need for PPE through telemedicine, physical barriers such as clear windows, allowing only those involved in direct care to enter a room with a COVID-19 patient, using only the PPE necessary for the specific task, continuing use of the same respirator without removing it while caring for multiple patients with the same diagnosis, monitoring and coordinating the PPE supply chain, and discouraging the use of masks for asymptomatic individuals.
targetString: Mpo biloko nyonso oyo PPE ezopesa ekoki te, OMS azondima kosalela mingi te PPE na telemedecine, bipekiseli mpo bato bakutana te na ndakisa bafenetre ya polele, kopesa nzela na minganga na kokota na shambre ya moto oyo azobela COVID-19, kosalela kaka PPE oyo eza ntina mpo na mosala ya sikisiki, kokoba kosalela eloko kaka moko esalisaka na kopema kozanga kolongola yango ntango azosalisa bato mingi oyo bazobela maladi moko, kobatela mpe kosalela malamu ba PPE mosusu, mpe kolendisa te kosalela bamasque mpo na bato oyo baza na bilembo te.
translated: Soki totali ete bopesi ya PPE na mokili mobimba ekoki te, OMS epesi toli ya kokitisa bosenga ya PPE na nzela ya telemedicine, ba barrières physiques lokola ba fenêtres ya polele, kopesa nzela kaka na baye bazali na soins directs bakota na chambre na mobeli ya COVID-19, kosalela kaka PPE oyo esengeli mpo na mosala ya sikisiki, kokoba kosalela respirateur moko kozanga kolongola yango ntango ozali kobatela ba maladi ebele oyo bazali na diagnostic moko, kolandela mpe kosala boyokani na molongo ya bopesi ya PPE, mpe kolembisa kosalela masques mpo na bato oyo bazali na bilembo te.

sourceString: FROM: Katherine Maher, Wikimedia Foundation CEO
targetString: EUTI NA: Katherine Maher, CEO ya fondation Wikimedia
translated: EBANDA NA: Katherine Maher, mokambi ya Fondation Wikimedia

sourceString: TO: All Wikimedia Foundation staff
targetString: NA: Basali nyonso ya fondation Wikimedia
translated: TO: Basali banso ya Fondation Wikimedia

sourceString: SUBJECT LINE: [Covid-19] Lightening the load and preparing for the future
targetString: MOTO YA LIKAMBO: [Covid-19] Kongengisa nzela mpe komibongisa mpo na mikolo ezoya
translated: SUJECT LINE: [Covid-19] Kopelisa mokumba mpe komibongisa mpo na mikolo mizali koya

sourceString: SEND DATE/TIME: 14 March, 2020, 00:24 UTC
targetString: DATE/NTANGO ETINDAMI: Mokolo ya 14 sanza ya misato 2020, 00:24 UTC
translated: MOKOLO/NTANGO YA KOTINDA: 14 mars, 2020, 00:24 UTC

sourceString: LICENSING: CC0: No rights reserved
targetString: NDINGISA: CC0: Eza na lotomo moko te
translated: LICENSING: CC0: Makoki mazali ya yo moko te

sourceString: We find ourselves in remarkable circumstances this month.
targetString: Na sanza oyo tokutani mpenza na makambo ya kokamwa.
translated: Tomimoni na makambo ya kokamwa na sanza oyo.

sourceString: The COVID-19 epidemic is something that makes clear our global human interconnectedness and the responsibilities we have to one another.
targetString: Maladi ya COVID-19 emonisa mpenza polele ete toza ya kosangana bamoko na basusu mpe toza na mikumba mpo na bato mosusu.
translated: Epidemie ya COVID-19 ezali likambo oyo ezali kolakisa polele boyokani na biso ya bato na mokili mobimba mpe mikumba tozali na yango moko na mosusu.

sourceString: We don’t have precedent for its challenges, but we do know that our best response relies on the sort of global empathy, cooperation, and community building that sits at the heart of this organization.
targetString: Toyebi te bampasi oyo ekobimisa te, kasi toyebi ete milende na biso ya malamu ya kobundisa yango esimbami na makasi, boyokani, mpe bato ya mboka oyo baza ntina mingi na lisanga oyo.
translated: Tozali na liboso te mpo na mikakatano na yango, kasi toyebi ete eyano na biso ya malamu koleka etali lolenge ya boyokani ya mokili mobimba, boyokani, mpe botongi lisanga oyo efandi na motema ya ebongiseli oyo.

sourceString: The camaraderie and care we have seen among all of our colleagues over email, calls, and chats is a remarkable validation of the incredible humans we are fortunate enough to work with.
targetString: Boninga mpe bolingo oyo tomoni na kati ya baninga na biso nyonso na ba email, kobenga na telefone, mpe masolo ezondimisa mpenza ete tosalaka na bato ya malamu mpenza.
translated: Camaraderie mpe soin oyo tomoni kati na baninga na biso nionso na nzela ya email, ba appels, mpe ba chats ezali validation ya kokamwa ya bato ya kokamwa oyo tozali na chance ya kosala na bango.

sourceString: I couldn’t be more grateful and proud to count you all as colleagues.
targetString: Napesa bango bino baninga nyonso matondi mingi mpe nazanga na esengo ya kotyela bino motema.
translated: Nakokaki te kozala na botondi mpe lolendo koleka mpo na kotanga bino banso lokola baninga ya mosala.

sourceString: Last week, someone shared with me their appreciation for our work.
targetString: Na mposo eleki, moto moko ayebisaka ngai ndenge basepelaka na mosala na biso.
translated: Pɔsɔ eleki, moto moko ayebisaki ngai botɔndi na bango mpo na mosala na biso.

sourceString: They reminded me how meaningful it is for the world to be able to turn to Wikipedia right now, and what a powerful symbol it is for this critical resource to remain online and available to all.
targetString: Ekundwelaki ngai ndenge eza ntina mingi ete bato bakende na Wikipedia kaka sikoyo, mpe eza elembo makasi emonisi ete misala ya ntina esengeli kozala na internet mpe bato nyonso bazala na likoki ya komona yango.
translated: Bakundolisaki ngai boniboni ezali na ntina mpo na mokili kozala na makoki ya kobalukela Wikipedia sikawa, mpe nini elembo ya nguya ezali mpo na lisungi oyo ya ntina kotikala na internet mpe ezala na nzela ya bato banso.

sourceString: Your work makes this possible, whether you keep the sites stay up or our colleagues paid or our communities safe.
targetString: Mosala na bino nde esalisaka mpo esalema bongo, ezala bozotya bansango ya sika na basite to kofuta baninga na biso to kobatela mboka na biso.
translated: Mosala na yo esalaka ete yango ezala likoki, ezala ozali kobatela ba sites to bafuta baninga na biso to ba communautés na biso na sécurité.

sourceString: The world needs the information that Wikipedia provides, now more than ever.
targetString: Sikoyo mpenza, mokili eza na mposa ya bansango oyo Wikipedia epesaka.
translated: Mokili ezali na mposa ya sango oyo Wikipedia epesaka, sikoyo koleka liboso.

sourceString: This is a moment in which not only what we do, but how we do it, will make a meaningful impact on the world.
targetString: Oyo eza eleko oyo makambo ekozala na ntina mingi mpo na mokili eza kaka te makambo tozosala, kasi mpe ndenge tosalaka yango.
translated: Oyo ezali ntango oyo kaka te oyo tosalaka, kasi lolenge nini tosalaka yango, ekosala bopusi ya ntina na mokili.

sourceString: Because of the importance of this mission and your role in it, we will be making some significant adjustments to how we work together, starting this coming week.
targetString: Mpo mosala oyo mpe mokumba na bino eza ntina mingi, tokobongola ndenge tosalaka elongo, kobanda na mposo oyo.
translated: Na ntina ya ntina ya misio oyo mpe mokumba na bino kati na yango, tokozala kosala mwa mbongwana ya ntina na lolenge nini tosalaka elongo, kobanda na poso oyo ezali koya.

sourceString: Adjustments to our work and schedules
targetString: Mbongwana na mosala mpe manaka na biso
translated: Mbongwana na mosala mpe na manaka na biso

sourceString: As Robyn mentioned previously, the c-team met last night to discuss our approach and schedule for the coming days and months.
targetString: Ndenge Robyn autaki kolobela yango, etuluku c ekutanaki na butu eleki mpo na kolobela lolenge na biso ya kosala mosala mpe manaka na biso na mikolo mpe basanza ezoya.
translated: Ndenge Robyn alobaki liboso, c-team ekutanaki lobi na butu mpo na kolobela ndenge na biso ya kosala mpe manaka mpo na mikolo mpe basanza oyo ekoya.

sourceString: In that conversation, we considered what we thought would be an appropriate response to what we’re facing and the best way to keep the organization sustainable during this time.
targetString: Na masolo wana, tolobelaka makambo oyo tokanisi eza lolenge ya malamu ya kobunda na makambo oyo tozokutana na yango mpe lolenge ya malamu ya kosala ete organisation na biso ekoba kosala na eleko oyo.
translated: Na lisolo wana, totalelaki oyo tokanisaki ekozala eyano oyo ebongi na oyo tozali kokutana na yango mpe lolenge malamu ya kobatela ebongiseli ya koumela na ntango oyo.

sourceString: Overwhelmingly we wanted to remove stress and support our mission for the long term.
targetString: Toza na mposa ya kolongola mitungisi mpe kopesa maboko na mosala na biso mpo na ntango ya molai.
translated: Na ndenge ya koleka ndelo tolingaki kolongola mitungisi mpe kosunga mission na biso mpo na ntango molai.

sourceString: If you need to dial back, that’s okay.
targetString: Soki olingi kobenga biso, eza mabe te.
translated: Soki osengeli kozongisa telefone, ezali mabe te.

sourceString: For all staff, contractors, and contract workers:
targetString: Mpo na bakonzi, ba entrepreneur mpe bato ya mosala nyonso:
translated: Mpo na basali banso, ba entrepreneurs, mpe basali ya contrat:

sourceString: our daily working expectations will be about 4 hours a day, or 20 hours a week until further notice.
targetString: ngonga na biso ya mosala ya mokolo na mokolo ekozala bangonga 4, to bangonga 20 na mposo moko kino tokobongola yango.
translated: bilikya na biso ya mosala ya mokolo na mokolo ekozala pene na ngonga 4 na mokolo, to ngonga 20 na poso kino ntango ekoyebisama lisusu.

sourceString: We’re not declaring a holiday - if you are able to work more normal hours, the mission can use you.
targetString: Tolobi te ete bozwi congé - soki oza na likoki ya kosala bangonga mingi koleka, bakoki kosalela yo.
translated: Tozali kosakola konje te - soki ozali na makoki ya kosala bangonga mingi ya normal, mission ekoki kosalela yo.

sourceString: However, the world is unpredictable right now, and whether you need to care for loved ones, get groceries, or go to the doctor, your well-being is our priority.
targetString: Kasi, makambo ezobima na mokili eyebani te sikoyo, mpe soki ekosenga obatela moto moko oyo olingaka, okende kosomba bilei, to kokende kokutana na monganga, santé na ye esengeli kozwa esika ya liboso.
translated: Kasi, mokili ezali likambo oyo ekoki kokanisama te sikoyo, mpe ezala osengeli kobatela balingami na yo, kozwa biloko ya kolya, to kokende epai ya monganga, bolamu na yo ezali likambo oyo tosengeli kotya na esika ya liboso.

sourceString: We are not tracking your time.
targetString: Tozolandela te ntango na yo ya mosala.
translated: Tozali kolandela ngonga na yo te.

sourceString: If you are sick, do not work.
targetString: Soki ozobela, koya te na mosala.
translated: Soki ozali na maladi, kosala mosala te.

sourceString: This should go without saying, but we’re saying it.
targetString: Esengeli kosalema kozanga toloba yango, kasi tozoloba yango.
translated: Oyo esengeli ekende kozanga koloba, kasi tozali koloba yango.

sourceString: No sick days or PTO required - just tell your manager and help your team revise calendars and schedules to make sure key areas of work are covered.
targetString: Oza te na ntina ya mikolo ya maladi to PTO - yebisa kaka mokonzi na yo mpe salisa baninga ya mosala bayeba ndenge ya kobongisa manaka mpo misala ya ntina ekobaka kosalema.
translated: Mikolo ya bokono to PTO esengeli te - yebisa kaka mokambi na yo mpe salisa ekipi na yo kozongela ba calendriers mpe manaka mpo na kosala ete bisika ya ntina ya mosala ezwama.

sourceString: (If you are diagnosed positive for COVID-19, please let Bryan within T&C Ops know so T&C can help with support and make sure your situation gets appropriate attention from management).
targetString: (Soki bakangi yo maladi ya COVID-19, tosengi yo oyebisa Bryan within T&C Ops ebongo T&C akoki kosunga yo mpe kosalisa yo mpo bakonzi batyela yo likebi ebongi).
translated: (Soki bamoni yo na COVID-19, tosengi oyebisa Bryan na kati ya T&C Ops po T&C ekoka kosunga na lisungi mpe kosala ete situation na yo ezwa attention oyo esengeli epai ya bakambi).

sourceString: Hourly folks will be fully paid.
targetString: Bakofuka ngonga ya mosala nyonso.
translated: Bato ya ngonga na ngonga bakofutama mobimba.

sourceString: We have already said, and are recommitting to honor our commitments to our contractors and hourly staff colleagues.
targetString: Tosi tolobaki yango, mpe tozozongeli komipesa na biso mpo na kotosa boyokani na biso na ba entrepeneur na biso mpe baninga ya mosala oyo basalaka na bangonga eyebani.
translated: Tosili koloba, mpe tozali komipesa lisusu mpo na kokumisa mikano na biso epai ya ba entrepreneurs mpe baninga na biso ya mosala ya ngonga na ngonga.

sourceString: Everyone will be paid on the basis of their usual hours worked during normal circumstances.
targetString: Bakofuta bato nyonso na kotalela bangonga oyo basalaka mbala na mbala ntango makambo esalemaka bo momeseno.
translated: Moto nyonso akofutama na kotalela bangonga oyo ameseni kosala na ntango ya makambo ya momeseno.

sourceString: This includes if you are sick and unable to work.
targetString: Etaleli mpe soki ozobela to ozokoka te kosala.
translated: Yango esangisi soki ozali na maladi mpe ozali kokoka kosala mosala te.

sourceString: If you want to work, we support you.
targetString: Soki olingi kosala, tokosalisa yango.
translated: Soki olingi kosala, to soutenir yo.

sourceString: Many people use work as a way of channeling their stress with the world around us.
targetString: Bato mingi basalelaka mosala lokola eleko esalisaka bango na kokabola mitungisi na bango na bato oyo bakutanaka na bango.
translated: Bato mingi basalelaka mosala lokola lolenge ya kotinda mitungisi na bango na mokili oyo ezingi biso.

sourceString: What we do can be incredibly rewarding, especially during times like this.
targetString: Oyo tosalaka ekoki kosalisa mingi mpenza, mingimingi na bantango neti oyo.
translated: Oyo tosalaka ekoki kozala na mbano ya kokamwa, mingimingi na ntango lokola oyo.

sourceString: Again, this is about your self-care.
targetString: Lisusu, ezotalela ndenge omibatelaka.
translated: Na likambo oyo mpe, oyo ezali mpo na komibatela na yo moko.

sourceString: Our ask is that you communicate with your manager, so we know what to expect and can adjust accordingly.
targetString: Tozosenga ete osolola na mokonzi na yo, mpo toyeba makambo tokosala mpe nasala mbongwana ebongi.
translated: Ask na biso ezali que o communiquer na directeur na yo, po toyeba nini tosengeli kozela pe tokoki ko s’adapter en conséquence.

sourceString: Some work is considered essential.
targetString: Misala mosusu etalelami ete eza ya ntina mingi.
translated: Mosala mosusu etalelami lokola likambo ya ntina.

sourceString: There are some things that we must keep doing.
targetString: Eza na makambo mosusu oyo tosengeli kokoba kosala.
translated: Ezali na makambo mosusu oyo tosengeli kokoba kosala.

sourceString: The SRE, HR Ops, Trust & Safety, and Fundraising teams (among others) do critical work that may need additional support.
targetString: Masanga ya SRE, HR Ops, Trust & Safety, and Fundraising (na kati na yango) esalaka misala ya ntina oyo ekoki kosenga lisungi mosusu.
translated: Ba équipes ya SRE, HR Ops, Trust & Safety, mpe Fundraising (kati na basusu) basalaka misala ya ntina oyo ekoki kozala na mposa ya lisungi ya kobakisa.

sourceString: We’ll begin a process with all departments to assess current objectives and shift our focus to supporting what’s essential for our mission.
targetString: Tokobanda mosala moko na badepartema nyonso mpo na koyeba mikano na biso ya sika mpe kotya likebi sikoyo na kopesa maboko na makambo ya ntina ya mosala na biso.
translated: Tokobanda mosala elongo na ba départements nionso mpo na kotala mikano ya lelo mpe kobongola makanisi na biso na kosunga oyo ezali na ntina mpo na mission na biso.

sourceString: There’s plenty to do for all of us, we just will all focus on the most essential projects.
targetString: Biso nyonso toza na mosala mingi, kasi tokotya likebi na misala ya ntina mingi.
translated: Ezali na makambo mingi ya kosala mpo na biso banso, biso banso tokotia kaka makanisi na biso na ba projets ya ntina mingi.

sourceString: Slowing now won’t hurt later.
targetString: Kolembisa sikoyo ekosala biso mpasi te na nsima.
translated: Kosala malembe sikoyo ekosala mpasi te na nsima.

sourceString: We do not plan to go “double-time to catch up” once the pandemic has passed.
targetString: Toza te na likanisi ya “kosala mbala mibale koleka mpo na ko recuperer” soki maladi esili.
translated: Tozali kokana te kokende “mbala mibale mpo na kokanga” mbala moko pandemie eleki.

sourceString: You will not be expected to work extra hours to meet deadlines which are now unrealistic.
targetString: Tokosenga biso te bosalaka ba heure supplémentaire mpo na kosilisa mosala na badate na yango oyo eza ntina te sikoyo.
translated: Bakozela te ete osala bangonga ya kobakisa mpo na kokokisa mikolo ya suka oyo ezali sikawa ya solo te.

sourceString: We accept that circumstances have changed, and will work to set new targets and timelines where appropriate.
targetString: Tozondima ete makambo ebongwani, mpe tokobongisa makambo mpo na komityela mikano ya sika mpe badate bisika oyo eza mpenza ntina.
translated: Tondimi ete makambo ebongwanaki, mpe tokosala mpo na kotia mikano ya sika mpe ntango esika esengeli.

sourceString: What happens with the APP (Annual Planning)?
targetString: Nini ekokomela APP (planification annuelle)?
translated: Nini esalemaka na APP (Planification annuelle)?

sourceString: To adjust to our new reality and daily working hour expectations, we intend to adjust the timeline for the delivery of our 2020-2021 Annual Plan.
targetString: Mpo komesana na makambo ya sika mpe bangonga ya mosala ya mokolo na mokolo, tozolinga kobongola ntango oyo tokobimisa planification annuelle na biso ya 2020-2021.
translated: Mpo na komesana na bosolo na biso ya sika mpe bilikya ya ngonga ya mosala ya mokolo na mokolo, tozali na mokano ya kobongisa ntango mpo na bopesi ya Plan Annuel na biso ya 2020-2021.

sourceString: Our intention is to propose an extension of our 2019-2020 plan that allows more time for budgeting to allow employees to prioritize critical work, self-care, and care for loved ones while accommodating those who need or wish to work a reduced schedule over the next few weeks.
targetString: Likanisi na biso eza ya kosenga babakisa mikolo na planification na biso ya mobu 2019-2020 mpo tozala na likoki ya kobongisa makambo ya mbongo oyo ekosalisa bato na biso ya mosala batya likebi nanu na misala ya ntina, komibatela, mpe kobatela bato oyo balingaka ntango tozotalela baoyo basengeli to balingi kosala ngonga moko na bamposo ezoya.
translated: Mokano na biso ezali ya kopesa likanisi ya kobakisama ya mwango na biso ya 2019-2020 oyo epesaka ntango mingi mpo na kosala budget mpo na kopesa nzela na basali ete bátya na esika ya liboso mosala ya ntina, komibatela, mpe kobatela balingami na bango wana tozali koyamba baoyo bazali na mposa to balingi kosala manaka oyo ekitisami koleka mwa bapɔsɔ oyo ekoya.

sourceString: This timeline extension greatly reduces current planning workloads and pressure across the whole organization.
targetString: Kobakisa mikolo ekotisa mpenza mosala ya kobongisa makambo ya sikoyo mpe pression na organisation mobimba.
translated: Bobakisi oyo ya tango ekitisaka mingi ba charges ya mosala ya planification ya lelo mpe pression na kati ya organisation mobimba.

sourceString: We will introduce our proposal to the Board next week and will update delegates and teams on the next steps as soon as we have confirmation.
targetString: Tokotinda likanisi na biso na bakonzi na mposo ezoya mpe koyebisa mimonisi mpe ba-ekipe na biso makambo ya kosala nsima soki tozwi eyano ya bakonzi.
translated: Tokoyebisa likanisi na biso na Conseil mposo ekoya mpe tokoyebisa ba délégués mpe ba équipes na ba étapes oyo ekolanda noki soki tozwi confirmation.

sourceString: Thank you to the APP team for your leadership in this.
targetString: Topesa matondi na ekipe ya APP ndenge bokambi misala oyo.
translated: Merci na équipe ya APP pona leadership na bino na likambo oyo.

sourceString: Office status, exposure, and cleaning
targetString: Statut ya biro, kozala na likama ya maladi, mpe kotya bopeto
translated: Ezalela ya biro, botalisami, mpe bopeto

sourceString: Last week, we learned that one of our SF-based colleagues may have been exposed to the COVID-19 virus.
targetString: Na mposo eleki, bayebisaki biso ete mbala mosusu moninga na biso moko akutanaki na moto moko oyo aza na virisi COVID-19.
translated: Pɔsɔ eleki, toyebaki ete moko ya baninga na biso ya mosala oyo bazali na SF akoki kozala na virus ya COVID-19.

sourceString: However, out of an abundance of caution, we employed an antiviral cleaning crew to disinfect all surfaces in the San Francisco office.
targetString: Kasi, mpo na kokeba makasi, tosalelaki nkisi ebomaka virisi mpo na kopetola bisika nyonso na biro ya Francisco.
translated: Kasi, mpo na bokebi mingi, tozwaki bato oyo bazalaki kopɛtola bato oyo babundisaka mikrobe mpo na koboma mikrobe na bisika nyonso oyo ezalaki na biro ya San Francisco.

sourceString: They utilized a hospital-grade anti-viral solution to disinfect every surface, as well as the lobby and elevator banks accessing our floor.
targetString: Basalelaki nkisi ya koboma mikrobe oyo basalelaka na balopitalo mpo na kopetola bisika nyonso, eza esika ya kokotela mpe ba elevateur oyo ememaka na biro na biso.
translated: Basalelaki solution antivirale ya qualité ya lopitalo mpo na ko désinfecter surface nionso, mpe lisusu na ba banques ya lobby mpe ya ascenseur oyo ekɔtaka na étage na biso.

sourceString: The building is employing its own duty-of-care protocol utilizing products that support the safety of their tenants.
targetString: Basalelaka ndako yango esalelaka mibeko na yango moko.
translated: Ndako yango ezali kosalela protocole na yango moko ya devoir-de-care en utilisant ba produits oyo esungaka sécurité ya ba locataires na bango.

sourceString: We feel comfortable that the office will be well-prepared for when we decide to return.
targetString: Toza motema ya kokita mpo toyebi ete biro ekozala malamu mpenza ntango tokozonga kuna.
translated: Toyokaka malamu ete biro ekobongisama malamu mpo na ntango tokozwa ekateli ya kozonga.

sourceString: Our DC office is located in a WeWork, which has shared its COVID-19 protocol with us and all DC-based staff members.
targetString: Biro na biso ya DC eza na WeWork, oyo eyebisi biso mibeko na bango ya komibatela COVID-19 mpe epesi yango na basali nyonso ya DC.
translated: Biro na biso ya DC ezali na kati ya WeWork, oyo ekaboli protocole na yango ya COVID-19 na biso mpe na basali banso oyo bazali na DC.

sourceString: As of last week, our DC office moved to a fully remote setup in line with the guidance shared with San Francisco.
targetString: Na mposo eleki, babongisaki biro na biso ya DC mpo bato babanda kosala mosika na kolanda litambwisi oyo eutaki na San Francisco.
translated: Lokola ya poso eleki, biro na biso ya DC ekendeki na setup ya mosika mpenza na boyokani na bokambi oyo bakabolaki na San Francisco.

sourceString: As some of our NYC-based colleagues know, we have also been in discussion about leasing a location in Brooklyn.
targetString: Ndenge baninga na biso mosusu ya NYC bayebi, tozalaki mpe na masolo mpo na koluka esika na Brooklyn.
translated: Lokola baninga na biso mosusu ya mosala oyo bafandaka na NYC bayebi yango, tozalaki mpe na masolo mpo na kofutela esika moko na Brooklyn.

sourceString: These discussions are continuing but may be delayed.
targetString: Masolo oyo ezolandaka kasi oyo kozela.
translated: Masolo yango ezali kokoba kasi ekoki kozala na retard.

sourceString: Some of our colleagues are working remotely for the first time.
targetString: Baninga na biso mosusu bazosala na mosika mpo na mbala ya liboso.
translated: Baninga na biso mosusu ya mosala bazali kosala na mosika mpo na mbala ya liboso.

sourceString: Our long-time remote colleagues know that it can be an adjustment, and wanted to offer you some advice:
targetString: Baninga na biso ya kala oyo basalaka mosika bayebi ete ekoki kozala mbongwana, mpe tolingaki kopesa bino mwa batoli:
translated: Baninga na biso ya mosala oyo bazali na mosika banda kala bayebi ete ekoki kozala mbongwana, mpe balingaki kopesa yo mwa toli:

sourceString: Limit the length of meetings to at most one or two hour increments.
targetString: Kosala ete makita ezwa ngonga moko to mibale.
translated: Bopekisa bolai ya makita na bobakisi ya ngonga moko to mibale.

sourceString: If longer sessions are required, consider how they can be broken up over the course of several days.
targetString: Soki esengeli kozwa ntango mingi, botala soki bokoki kosala yango mokemoke na mikolo mingi.
translated: Soki esengeli kosala ba sessions ya milayi, talelá ndenge oyo bakoki kokabwana na boumeli ya mikolo mingi.

sourceString: Clearly define the meeting, have an agenda, and send reading materials in advance.
targetString: Boyeba polele ntina ya likita, makambo bokolobela, mpe botinda makambo ya kokanga na liboso.
translated: Limbolá likita yango polele, bózala na programɛ, mpe tindá liboso biloko ya kotánga.

sourceString: Make video the default, with tools like Google Docs and Zoom to facilitate live collaboration and connection.
targetString: Boyebisa video oyo bakosalela, na bisaleli neti Google Doc mpe Zoom mpo masolo ya en direct eleka malamu mpe connection eza bien.
translated: Salá ete video ezala par défaut, na bisaleli lokola Google Docs mpe Zoom mpo na ko faciliter collaboration en direct mpe connexion.

sourceString: Have a lead to facilitate every meeting, someone to monitor the chat for questions and track the speaker list, and someone to help take notes (or do collaborative note-taking).
targetString: Bozala na mokambi mpo likita nyonso esalema malamu, moto oyo akoyanola na chat mpo na mituna oyo bazotuna mpe bapiste oyo eza na liste ya balobi, mpe moto oyo ekosalisa na kozwa banote (to bosalisana na kozwa banote).
translated: Zala na lead mpo na ko faciliter likita nionso, mutu oyo akolandela chat pona ba questions pe kolandela liste ya ba orateurs, pe mutu oyo asalisaka kozua ba notes (to kosala collaborative note-taking).

sourceString: Send an email to tech support if you need a comfortable headset.
targetString: Botindela ba support informatique email soki boza na mposa ya ba écouteur ya malamu.
translated: Tinda email na tech support soki oza na besoin ya casque confortable.

sourceString: Use your wellness reimbursement for snacks.
targetString: Bosalela mbongo ya bien être mpo na bilei.
translated: Salelá mbongo na yo ya kozongisa na nzoto kolɔngɔnɔ mpo na bilei ya mikemike.

sourceString: Join the #remoties channel in Slack to talk with your colleagues about distributed work
targetString: Kota na chaine #remoties na Slack mpo na kosolola na baninga na yo na ntina na mosala
translated: Kota na chaîne #remoties na Slack mpo na kosolola na baninga na yo ya mosala na ntina ya mosala oyo ekabolami

sourceString: The HR Operations team is looking into webinar-based ergonomics guidance to support the increase in distributed work across the Foundation.
targetString: Ekipi ya HR ezozela makita ya internet mpo na litambwisi ekosalisa na kolandela mosala ya mingi oyo eza mpo na Fondation.
translated: Ekipi ya Misala ya RH ezali kotala na kati ya bokambi ya ergonomie oyo esalemi na webinar mpo na kosunga bomati ya mosala oyo ekabolami na Fondation mobimba.

sourceString: This past week we asked all community grant recipients to cancel Wikimedia-funded public events, such as editathons, until the WHO declares the pandemic to be over.
targetString: Na mposo eleki, toyebisaka bato nyonso na kokata makutani nyonso ya bato nyonso oyo Wikipedia efutaka mbongo, na ndakisa editathons, kino ntango OMS akoloba maladi mabe esili.
translated: Pɔsɔ oyo eleki tosengaki na baye banso bazwi lisungi ya lisanga ya bato banso milulu ya bato banso miye misolo ya Wikimedia, lokola ba éditathons, kino OMS ekosakola ete bokono boye bosili.

sourceString: We let them know that we understood that our request for cancellations and other restrictions could make it impossible to complete their agreed-upon grant activities and that no one would be penalized for having to delay or modify those goals.
targetString: Tokoyebisa bango ete toyebi ete kosenga kokata makutani wana mpe bipekiseli mosusu ekoki kosala ete ezala mpasi na kosala makambo oyo toyokanaki mpe ekozala foti ya moto moko te ndenge topusi date to tobongoli mikano oyo.
translated: Toyebisaki bango ete tososolaki ete bosenga na biso ya bolongoli mpe bipekiseli mosusu ekoki kosala ete ezala likoki te ya kosilisa misala na bango ya lisungi oyo bayokanaki mpe ete moto moko te akozwa etumbu mpo na kozala na mposa ya kozongisa nsima to kobongisa mikano wana.

sourceString: This coming week we will follow up with additional guidance on Wikimania and other regional and thematic community conferences.
targetString: Na mposo ezoya, tokotya mibeko mosusu na Wikimania mpe na makita mosusu ya bituka mpe ya mito ya makambo.
translated: Pɔsɔ oyo ezali koya tokolanda na bokambi ya kobakisa na ntina ya Wikimania mpe mayangani mosusu ya lisanga ya etuka mpe ya mitó ya makambo.

sourceString: The general sentiment from around the global community seems to be both sadness at the disruption but relief at the clarity and ability to focus on their own communities, Wikimedia and otherwise.
targetString: Mayoki ya bato na biso ya mokili mobimba eza ya mawa ndenge tokati misala oyo kasi motema ekiti na bandimbola mpe makoki ya kotya likebi na bituluku na bango, Wikimedia, mpe makambo mosusu.
translated: Sentiment général oyo euti na communauté mondiale emonani lokola ezali mawa na dérangement kasi soulagement na clarté mpe makoki ya ko focuser na ba communautés na bango moko, Wikimedia mpe na ndenge mosusu.

sourceString: Going forward, the CRT is working to set up a page on Meta-Wiki to provide a space for the community to monitor the impact and follow our communications with them.
targetString: Mpo na kokokisa yango, CRT ezali komilengela mpo na kosala nkasa ya Meta-Wiki mpo kopesa bituluku esika ya kolandela bopusi mpe masolo na biso na bango.
translated: Kokende liboso, CRT ezali kosala mpo na kosala lokasa na Meta-Wiki mpo na kopesa esika mpo na lisanga ya bato mpo na kolandela bopusi mpe kolanda bopanzi sango na biso na bango.

sourceString: Staying in touch around COVID-19 related issues
targetString: Kokoba koyeba makambo etali COVID-19
translated: Kotikala na boyokani nzinganzinga ya makambo matali COVID-19

sourceString: We’ll be sending an invitation to your calendars for next Thursday, 14:00 UTC/07:00 PT for a special staff meeting.
targetString: Tokotinda libyangi na kalandrie na biso na mokolo ya minei, na , 14:00 UTC/07:00 PT mpo na likita ya ntina ya bato ya mosala.
translated: Tokotinda invitation na ba calendriers na bino pona jeudi ekoya, 14:00 UTC/07:00 PT pona réunion spéciale ya basali.

sourceString: We’ll use this time to share additional updates, answer your questions and spend some time connecting with each other.
targetString: Tokosalela ngonga wana mpo na koyebisa bino makambo mosusu ya sika, kopesa biyano na mituna na bino mpe kolekisa ntango na mokomoko na bino.
translated: Tokosalela ntango oyo mpo na kokabola ba mises à jour ya kobakisa, koyanola na mituna na yo mpe kolekisa mwa ntango na kozala na boyokani moko na mosusu.

sourceString: We’re in this together and here to help however we can.
targetString: Toza elongo na likambo oyo mpe kosalisa bino na ndenge tokoki.
translated: Tozali na likambo oyo elongo mpe awa mpo na kosalisa ndenge nini tokoki.

sourceString: In the meantime, you can continue to find the information from this email, and all other essential COVID-19 related information, on Office Wiki.
targetString: Ntango bozozela, bokoki kokoba kolanda nsango eza na email oyo, mpe bansango mosusu ya ntina etali COVID-19, na Office Wiki.
translated: Na tango wana, bokoki kokoba koluka ba sango oyo euti na email oyo, pe ba sango nionso ya tina oyo etali COVID-19, na Office Wiki.

sourceString: The CRT will keep these pages updated and all the information in one place.
targetString: CRT ekokoba kotya bansango ya sika na bankasa oyo mpe kotya bansango nyonso esika moko.
translated: CRT ekobatela ba pages oyo na mikolo pe ba informations nionso na esika moko.

sourceString: We are also working to maintain regular communications with staff who reside in countries that are currently significantly affected.
targetString: Tozosala mpe makasi mpo na kokoba kosolola na bato na biso oyo bafandaka na mikili oyo maladi ebeti bango makasi.
translated: Tozali mpe kosala mpo na kobatela boyokani mbala na mbala na basali oyo bafandaka na mikili oyo ezali na mpasi mingi na ntango oyo.

sourceString: If you have any questions about travel, events, a major workstream, or coverage challenge, or anything else you may need help with, please don’t hesitate to notify and work with the CRT.
targetString: Soki boza na motuna na nyonso etali mobembo, makita, mosala, to lolenge ya kolonga bampasi, to likambo nyonso mosusu oyo ezosenga lisalisi, bokakatana te na koyebisa mpe kosala elonga na CRT.
translated: Soki ozali na mituna na ntina ya mobembo, makambo, mosala monene, to mokakatano ya bobateli, to likambo mosusu oyo okoki kozala na mposa ya lisalisi, tosengi yo kokakatana te koyebisa mpe kosala na CRT.

sourceString: We’re here to help provide support and liaise as needed.
targetString: Tozali wana mpo kopesa lisungi mpe lisalisi soki esengeli.
translated: Tozali awa mpo na kosalisa kopesa lisungi mpe boyokani soki esengeli.

sourceString: If you have a confidential or sensitive matter, please email Bryan Judan - Director of HR International Global Operations.
targetString: Soki oza na likambo ya sekele to ya ntina, komela Bryan Judan - diretere ya misala ya mokili mobimba ya HR.
translated: Soki ozali na likambo ya sekele to ya sensibles, tinda email na Bryan Judan - Directeur ya HR International Global Operations.

sourceString: None of these changes should be seen as an abandonment of our work and obligations.
targetString: Moto moko te asengeli komona bambongwana oyo neti kotika mikumba mpe mosala na biso.
translated: Moko te na mbongwana yango esengeli komonana lokola kotika mosala mpe mikumba na biso.

sourceString: Rather, they are a recognition that at this moment, our work and obligations will likely need to adapt in a way we have not in the past.
targetString: Kasi, ezali kondima ete na eleko oyo, mosala mpe mikumba na biso ekobongwana na ndenge oyo ebongwana nanu te.
translated: Kasi, ezali nde kondima ete na ngonga oyo, mosala mpe mikumba na biso ekosenga mbala mosusu komesana na lolenge oyo tosalaki yango te na kala.

sourceString: These are the steps we believe are necessary to support this one another so that we can continue to work, provide our movement with the support they need, and the world with the service they rely on.
targetString: Eza bitambe oyo tokanisi eza ntina mpo na kosalisana mpo tokoba kosala, kopesa etuluku na biso lisungi eza na yango mposa, mpe kosalela mokili mosala oyo etyelaka motema.
translated: Wana ezali matambe oyo tondimi ete esengeli mpo na kosunga oyo moko na mosusu mpo ete tokoka kokoba kosala, kopesa mobulu na biso lisungi oyo basengeli na yango, mpe mokili mobimba na mosala oyo batyelaka motema.

sourceString: Our planned work will be there waiting for us when the time comes.
targetString: Mosala na biso oyo tobongisa ekozela biso kino ntango ekokoka.
translated: Mosala na biso oyo tokanaki ekozala wana kozela biso ntango ntango ekoya.

sourceString: For now, it is time to support one another and create space for the important work that will be coming in the weeks and potentially months ahead.
targetString: Sikoyo eza ntango ya kosalisana mpe kosala bisika mpo na mosala ya ntina oyo ekoya na bamposo mpe mbala mosusu na basanza ezoya.
translated: Mpo na sikoyo, ezali ntango ya kosungana mpe kokela esika mpo na mosala ya ntina oyo ekoya na baposo mpe ekoki kozala basanza oyo ekoya.

sourceString: We need all of you to make that happen, and so we need you all to take care of yourself and your families so that you can be at your best when the need arises.
targetString: Toza na mposa na bino nyonso mpo esalema, yango wana tozosenga bino nyonso bomibatela mpe bobatela mabota na bino mpo bazala mpenza makasi ntango mposa ekozala.
translated: Tozali na mposa na bino banso mpo na kosala ete yango esalema, mpe bongo tozali na mposa na bino banso mpo na komibatela mpe mabota na bino mpo ete bokoka kozala na malamu na bino ntango mposa ebimi.

sourceString: Now, please -- wash your hands and don’t touch your face!
targetString: Sikoyo, tosengi biso -- bosukola maboko mpe bosimba elongi te!
translated: Sikawa, nabondeli yo -- sukola maboko mpe kosimba elongi na yo te!

sourceString: Katherine, the CRT (Amanda K, Amy V, Bryan J, Doreen D, Gregory V, Jaime V, Joel L, Lynette L, Ryan M, and Tony S), and the rest of the Leadership Team (Grant I, Heather W, Jaime V, Janeen U, Lisa S, Robyn A, Ryan M, and Toby N).
targetString: Katherine, CRT (Amanda K, Amy V, Bryan J, Doreen D, Gregory V, Jaime V, Joel L, Lynette L, Ryan M, mpe Tony S), mpe ekipe mobimba ya bakambi (Grant I, Heather W, Jaime V, Janeen U, Lisa S, Robyn A, Ryan M, na Toby N).
translated: Katherine, CRT (Amanda K, Amy V, Bryan J, Doreen D, Gregory V, Jaime V, Joel L, Lynette L, Ryan M, mpe Tony S), mpe bato mosusu ya Ekipi ya Bokambi (Grant I, Heather W , Jaime V, Janeen U, Lisa S, Robyn A, Ryan M, mpe Toby N).

sourceString: b'Angiotensin-converting enzyme 2 (ACE2) is an enzyme attached to the outer surface (cell membranes) of cells in the lungs, arteries, heart, kidney, and intestines.
targetString: Angiotensin ezali kokoma enzyme 2 (ACE2) ezali enzyme moko oyo ezali na libanda ya (membranes ya cellule) mimpulupulu, misisa, motema, bangei na misopo.
translated: b’Enzyme 2 oyo ebongoli angiotensine (ACE2) ezali enzyme oyo ekangami na libanda (ba membranes cellulaires) ya ba cellules na ba poumons, ba artéries, motema, rein mpe intestin.

sourceString: ACE2 counters the activity of the related angiotensin-converting enzyme (ACE) by reducing the amount of angiotensin-II and increasing Ang(1-7) making it a promising drug target for treating cardiovascular diseases.ACE2 also serves as the entry point into cells for some coronaviruses.
targetString: ACE2 ekangaka mosala ya kobalola angiotensin na enzyme (ACE) na kokitisa boni ya engiotensin-II mpe komatisa ang(1-7) kokomisa yango kisi y amakasi mpona kosalisa maladi ya motema. ACE2 mpe esalisamaka mpona kokota bacoronavirisi.
translated: ACE2 e contre activité ya enzyme convertissante ya angiotensine (ACE) oyo etali yango na kokitisa quantité ya angiotensine-II mpe komatisaka Ang(1-7) kosala yango cible ya kisi oyo elaka pona ko traité ba maladies cardiovasculaires.ACE2 esalaka pe lokola point ya entrée na ba cellules mpo na ba coronavirus mosusu.

sourceString: The human version of the enzyme is often referred to as hACE2.
targetString: Enzyme ya nzoto ya bato ebengami hACE2.
translated: Mbala mingi, babengaka version humaine ya enzyme yango hACE2.

sourceString: Angiotensin-converting enzyme 2 is a zinc containing metalloenzyme located on the surface of endothelial and other cells.
targetString: Angiotensin kokoma enzyme 2 ezali metalloenzyme oyo ezali na Zinx na likolo ya endothelial mpe bacellule misusu.
translated: Enzyme 2 oyo ebongoli angiotensine ezali enzyme oyo ezali na zinc oyo ezali na métalloenzyme oyo ezali na likoló ya baselile ya endothélium mpe ya baselile mosusu.

sourceString: ACE2 protein contains an N-terminal peptidase M2 domain and a C-terminal collectrin renal amino acid transporter domain.
targetString: Protein ya ACE2 ezali na N-terminal peptidase M2 mpe C-terminal ya kozwa ya zolo ya komema amono acid.
translated: Protéine ACE2 ezali na domaine M2 ya peptidase N-terminal mpe domaine transporteur ya ba acides aminés rénaux collectrine C-terminal.

sourceString: ACE2 is a single-pass type I membrane protein, with its enzymatically active domain exposed on the surface of cells in lungs and other tissues.
targetString: ACE2 esali type ya membrane ya protein kaka ya moko, na mosala na ye ya kokoma enzyme na libanda ya bacellule mpe baposo misusu.
translated: ACE2 ezali proteine ya membrane ya type I oyo elekaka mbala moko, na domaine na yango oyo esalaka enzymatique oyo emonisami na likolo ya ba cellules na ba poumons mpe na ba tissus mosusu.

sourceString: The extracellular domain of ACE2 is cleaved from the transmembrane domain by another enzyme known as sheddase, and the resulting soluble protein is released into the blood stream and ultimately excreted into urine.
targetString: Esika ya extracellular ya ACE2 euti na transmembrane na enzyme mosusu oyo babengi sheddase, nsima protein ekobima ekokota makila nsima ekobima na nzela ya masuba.
translated: Domaine extracellulaire ya ACE2 ekabwani na domaine transmembrane na enzyme mosusu oyo eyebani na kombo ya sheddase, mpe proteine soluble oyo euti na yango ebimaka na makila mpe na suka ebimaka na makila.

sourceString: ACE2 is present in most organs: ACE2 is attached to the cell membrane of mainly lung type II alveolar cells, enterocytes of the small intestine, arterial and venous endothelial cells and arterial smooth muscle cells in most organs.
targetString: ACE2 ezali na kati ya baorgan mingi: ACE2 ekangami na membrane ya cellule ya mimpulupulu ya type II ya bacellule ya alveolarenterocytes ya misopo ya moke, misisa mpe bavein ya endothelial mpe muscle ya pete ya cellule ya misisa na baorgans.
translated: ACE2 ezali na ba organes mingi : ACE2 ekangami na membrane cellulaire ya mingi mingi ba cellules alvéolaire ya type II ya poumons, ba enterocytes ya intestin grêle, ba cellules endothéliales artérielles mpe veineuses mpe ba cellules ya muscle lisse artériel na ba organes mingi.

sourceString: ACE2 mRNA expression is also found in the cerebral cortex, striatum, hypothalamus, and brainstem.
targetString: ACE2 mRNA ezali mpe na cortez, striatum, ypothalamus, mpe brainstem.
translated: Expression ya mRNA ya ACE2 ezwamaka mpe na cortex cérébral, striatum, hypothalamus, mpe tronche cerveau.

sourceString: The primary function of ACE2 is to act as a counter balance to ACE.
targetString: Mosala ya liboso ya aCE2 ezali kosala mosala ya ACE.
translated: Mosala ya libosoliboso ya ACE2 ezali ya kosala lokola contre-équilibre na ACE.

sourceString: ACE cleaves angiotensin I hormone into the vasoconstricting  angiotensin II.
targetString: ACE ekangisaka ba hormone ya I ya angiotensin na vasoconstriction ya angiotensin II.
translated: ACE ekabolaka hormone ya angiotensine I na angiotensine II oyo ekangamaka na misisa.

sourceString: ACE2 in turn cleaves the carboxyl-terminal amino acid phenylalanine from angiotensin II (Asp-Arg-Val-Tyr-Ile-His-Pro-Phe) and hydrolyses it into the vasodilator angiotensin (1-7), (H-Asp-Arg-Val-Tyr-Ile-His-Pro-OH).
targetString: ACE2 ekangamaka na carboxyl-terminal amino acid phenylalanine na angiotensin II (Asp-Arg-Tyr-Ile-His-Pro-pPhe) mpe kohydrolyse yango na kati ya vasodilator angiotensin (1-7), (H-Asp-Arg-Val-Tyr-Ile-His-Pro-OH).
translated: ACE2 na ngala na yango ekabolaka acide aminé phénylalanine ya carboxyle-terminal na angiotensine II (Asp-Arg-Val-Tyr-Ile-His-Pro-Phe) mpe e hydrolyser yango na angiotensine vasodilateur (1-7), (H-Asp-Arg -Val-Tyr-Ile-Ye-Pro-OH).

sourceString: ACE2 can also cleave a number of other peptides including [des-Arg9]-bradykinin, apelin, neurotensin, dynorphin A, and ghrelin.
targetString: ACE2 ekoki mpe kokangama na bapeptides mingi lekola [des-Arg9]-bradykinin, apelin, neurotensin, dynorphin A, na ghrelin.
translated: ACE2 ekoki mpe kokabola motango ya ba peptides mosusu lokola [des-Arg9]-bradykinine, apéline, neurotensine, dynorphine A, mpe ghréline.

sourceString: ACE2 also regulates the membrane trafficking of the neutral amino acid transporter SLC6A19 and has been implicated in Hartnup's disease.
targetString: ACE2 ebongisaka mpe embouteillage ya membrane ya neutral amino acid oyo ememaka SLC6A19 mpe ezalaki na maladi ya Hartnup.
translated: ACE2 e régulaka pe trafic ya membrane ya transporteur ya acide aminé neutre SLC6A19 mpe esili kozala impliqué na bokono ya Hartnup.

sourceString: As a transmembrane protein, ACE2 serves as the main entry point into cells for some coronaviruses, including HCoV-NL63; SARS-CoV (the virus that causes SARS); and SARS-CoV-2 (the virus that causes COVID-19).
targetString: Lekola protein ya transmembrane, ACE2 ezali esika ya liboso ya kokota ya bacellule ya coronavirisi, mpe HCoV-NL63; SARS-CoV (virisi oyo SARS euti); mpe SARS-CoV-2 (virisi oyo COVID-19 euti).
translated: Lokola proteine transmembrane, ACE2 esalaka lokola esika ya monene ya bokoti na baselile mpo na ba coronavirus mosusu, kati na yango HCoV-NL63; SARS-CoV (virus oyo epesaka SARS); mpe SARS-CoV-2 (virus oyo epesaka COVID-19).

sourceString: More specifically, the binding of the spike S1 protein of SARS-CoV and SARS-CoV2 to the enzymatic domain of ACE2 on the surface of cells results in endocytosis and translocation of both the virus and the enzyme into endosomes located within cells.
targetString: Na kososola malamu, kokangama ya nsonge ya protein ya S1 ya SARS-CoV na SARS-CoV2 na enzyme ya ACE2 na likolo ya bacellule ekomema endocytosis mpe kotambwisa virisi ya enzyme elongo moko na kati ya endosomes oyo ezali na kati ya bacellule.
translated: Na ndenge ya sikisiki, bokangami ya proteine S1 spike ya SARS-CoV mpe SARS-CoV2 na domaine enzymatique ya ACE2 na likolo ya ba cellules epesaka endocytose mpe translocation ya virus mpe enzyme na ba endosomes oyo ezali na kati ya ba cellules.

sourceString: This entry process also requires priming of the S protein by the host serine protease TMPRSS2, the inhibition of which is under current investigation as a potential therapeutic.This has led some to hypothesize that decreasing the levels of ACE2, in cells, might help in fighting the infection.
targetString: Esika ya kokota oyo esengi kobongisa protein S na serine protease TMPRSS2, oyo ezali bazali kososola therapy oyo ekoki kosimba. Oyo etindi bato misusu bakitisa ACE2, na kati ya bacellules, mpona komeka kobundela infection.
translated: Processus oyo ya entrée esengaka pe priming ya proteine S na protease sérine hôte TMPRSS2, inhibition na yango ezali sous enquête ya lelo lokola thérapeutique potentielle.Oyo ememi ba misusu na hypothèse que ko diminuer niveau ya ACE2, na ba cellules, ekoki ko aider na combat infection yango.

sourceString: However, multiple professional societies and regulatory bodies have recommended continuing standard ACE inhibitor and ARB therapy.
targetString: Kasi, basociete mini ya bayekoli mpe ya mibeko balobi ete esengeli bakenda kaka liboso na ACE oyo esengami mpe na therapie ya ARB.
translated: Kasi, ba sociétés professionnelles ebele mpe ba organismes réglementaires epesi toli ya kokoba traitement standard ya inhibiteur ya ACE mpe ya ARB.

sourceString: A systematic review and meta-analysis published on July 11, 2012, found that "use of ACE inhibitors was associated with a significant 34% reduction in risk of pneumonia compared with controls."
targetString: Lisosoli moko ya system mpe ya etid-ya-meta oyo babimisaki na mokolo ya 11 sanza ya nsambo 2012 emonaki ete ‘’kosalisa ACE ekokitisa na 34% chance ya pneumonia’’.
translated: Botali ya système mpe méta-analyse oyo ebimisamaki le 11 juillet 2012, emonisaki ete "kosalela ba inhibiteurs ya ACE ezalaki na boyokani na kokitisa monene ya 34% ya risque ya pneumonie soki tokokanisi yango na ba témoins."

sourceString: Moreover, "the risk of pneumonia was also reduced in patients treated with ACE inhibitors who were at higher risk of pneumonia, in particular those with stroke and heart failure.
targetString: Kasi mpe, ‘’risk ya pneumonia ekitaki mpe na bato oyo basalisaki bango na ACE bato oyo bakokaki kozwa pneumonia noki, lekola ba oyo bazalaki kobela motema.
translated: Lisusu, "likama ya bokono ya ntolo ekitisama mpe na baye bazwaki lisalisi ya ba inhibiteurs ya ACE oyo bazalaki na likama monene ya bokono ya ntolo, mingimingi baye bazalaki na AVC mpe insuffisance cardiaque."

sourceString: Use of ACE inhibitors was also associated with a reduction in pneumonia related mortality, although the results were less robust than for overall risk of pneumonia."
targetString: Kosalisa ACE esanganaki mpe na kokitisa pneumonia mpo bato bakufa te, kasi baresulta ezalaki makasi mingi te na oyo ya risk ya pneumonia.’’
translated: Kosalela ba inhibiteurs ya ACE ezalaki mpe na boyokani na kokitisa liwa oyo euti na pneumonie, atako ba résultats ezalaki makasi mingi te koleka mpo na risque mobimba ya pneumonie."

sourceString: Recombinant human ACE2 (rhACE2) is surmised to be a novel therapy for acute lung injury, and appeared to improve pulmonary hemodynamics and oxygen saturation in piglets with a lipopolysaccharide-induced acute respiratory distress syndrome.
targetString: Recombinant ya bato ACE2 (rhACE2) ezali therapie ya sika mpona mpasi ya mimpulupulu, mpe ezalaki kosalisa pulmonary hemodynaci mpe ekotonda ya oxygen na kati ya bangulu na lypopolysaccharie kati ya syndrome ya mpasi ya kopema.
translated: ACE2 humain recombinante (rhACE2) ekanisami kozala traitement ya sika mpo na ba blessures aiguës ya poumons, mpe emonanaki ete ebongisaka hémodynamique pulmonaire mpe saturation ya oxygène na bana ya ngulu oyo bazali na syndrome ya détresse respiratoire aiguë induit par lipopolysaccharide.

sourceString: The half-life of rhACE2 in human beings is about 10 hours and the onset of action is 30 minutes in addition to the course of effect (duration) of 24 hours.
targetString: Bomoi ya moke ya rhACE2 na kati ya bato ezali bangonga 10 mpe ekosala mosala na baminute 30 elongo moko na ngonga 24.
translated: Demi-vie ya rhACE2 na bato ezali soki 10 heures mpe ebandeli ya action ezali 30 minutes en plus ya cours ya effet (duration) ya 24 heures.

sourceString: Several findings suggest that rhACE2 may be a promising drug for those with intolerance to classic renin-angiotensin system inhibitors (RAS inhibitors) or in diseases where circulating angiotensin II is elevated.Infused rhACE2 has been evaluated in clinical trials for the treatment of acute respiratory distress syndrome.
targetString: Ba etid mingi elobi ete rhACE2 ekoki kozala kisi ya malamu mpona ba oyo nzoto eboyi renin-angiotensin (RAS inhibitors) to bamaldi angiotensin oyo ezali kotambo ezali makasi. rhACE2 esosolami na kati ya clinic mpona kosalisa maladi ya mpasi ya kopema.
translated: Ba résultats ebele ezo lakisa que rhACE2 ekoki kozala kisi ya elaka pona ba oyo bazali na intolérance na ba inhibiteurs classiques ya système rénine-angiotensine (ba inhibiteurs ya RAS) to na ba maladi esika angiotensine II circulante emati.rhACE2 infusé e évalué na ba études cliniques pona traitement ya détresse respiratoire aigu syndrome (syndrome) oyo ezali na maladi.

sourceString: b'COVID-19 apps are mobile software applications designed to aid contact tracing in response to the 2019-20 coronavirus pandemic, i.e. the process of identifying persons ("contacts") who may have been in contact with an infected individual.
targetString: B’COVID-19 apps ezali baaplication ya telephone oyo esalemi mpona kolanda bato oyo bakoki kozala na maladi ya pandemi ya coronavirisi ya 2019-20. Lekola, ndenge ya koyeba (‘’bato’’) oyo bakokaki kozala esika moko na moto oyo azalaki na maladi.
translated: b'COVID-19 apps ezali ba applications logicielles mobiles oyo esalemi pona kosunga traçage ya contact na réponse na pandemie ya coronavirus ya 2019-20, c'est-à-dire processus ya koyeba bato ("contacts") oyo bakoki kozala na contact na mutu oyo azali na bokono.

sourceString: Numerous applications were developed or proposed, with official government support in some territories and jurisdictions.
targetString: Baaplication mingi esalemaki, mpe na lisungi ya gouvernema na bisika misusu.
translated: Ebele ya ba demandes esalemaki to e proposer, na soutien officiel ya gouvernement na ba territoires mpe ba jurisdictions mosusu.

sourceString: Several frameworks for building contact tracing apps have been developed.
targetString: Ba ndenge mingi ya kolandela bato esalemaki na baaplication ya telephone.
translated: Ba cadres ebele pona kotonga ba applis ya traçage ya contact esalemi.

sourceString: Privacy concerns have been raised, especially about systems that are based on tracking the geographical location of app users.
targetString: Bato basepekali te na ndenge ezali kotia miso na basekele ya bato, lekola basystem oyo ezali kolanda esika oyo bato bazali.
translated: Mitungisi ya bomoto ebimisamaki, mingimingi mpo na ba systèmes oyo esalemi na kolandela esika ya géographie ya basaleli ya app.

sourceString: Less intrusive alternatives include the use of Bluetooth signals to log a user's proximity to other cellphones.
targetString: Ya kotia miso mingi te na kati ya basekele ya bato ezali basignal ya Bluetooth oyo ekoyebisa moto soki azali pene na ba telephone misusu.
translated: Ba alternatives moins intrusives ezali kosalela ba signaux Bluetooth pona ko enregistrer proximité ya usager na ba téléphones cellulaires misusu.

sourceString: On 10 April 2020, Google and Apple jointly announced that they would integrate functionality to support such Bluetooth-based apps directly into their Android and iOS operating systems.
targetString: Na mokolo ya 10 sanza ya minei 2020, Google na Apple balobaki ete bakotia basystem ya kosunga application ya Bluetooth wana na kati ya Android na iOS.
translated: Na mokolo ya 10 avril 2020, Google na Apple basakolaki elongo ete bakosangisa fonctionnalité mpo na ko soutenir ba applis ya boye oyo esalemi na Bluetooth directement na ba systèmes d’exploitation Android na iOS na bango.

sourceString: In China, the Chinese government, in conjunction with Alipay, has deployed an app that allows citizens to check if they have been in contact with people that have COVID-19.
targetString: Na Chine, gouvernema ya Chine, elongo moko na Alipay, esali application oyo esungi bato ya mboka koyeba soki bazalaki pene na moto oyo azali na COVID-19.
translated: Na Chine, mbulamatari ya Chine, elongo na Alipay, etie appli oyo epesi nzela na bana mboka kotala soki bazalaki na contact na bato oyo bazali na COVID-19.

sourceString: It is in use across more than 200 Chinese cities.In Singapore, an app called TraceTogether is being used.
targetString: Ezali kosalema kati na bigumba 200 na Chine, na Singapore, application moko nkombo TraceTogether ezali kosalema.
translated: Ezali kosalelama na bingumba koleka 200 ya Chine.Na Singapour, bazali kosalela appli moko oyo babengi TraceTogether.

sourceString: The app was developed by local IT community, released as open source and will be handed over to the government.North Macedonia launched "StopKorona!", a Bluetooth-based app to trace exposure with potentially infected persons and  provide a fast response to healthcare authorities.
targetString: Bato ya mayele ya IT na kati ya egumba moto basalaki application yango, babimisaki yango mpona moto nyonso asalisa mpe bako pesa yango na gouvernema. Macedoine ya Nord ebimisaki ‘’StopKorona!’’, application ya Bluetooth oyo ekomona soki moto amipesi na maladi epayi ya moto oyo azali na maladi mpe kosunga etumba ya gouvernema na kolongono.
translated: Application oyo esalemaki na communauté ya IT ya mboka, ebimaki lokola source ouverte mpe ekopesama na gouvernement.Macédoine du Nord ebandi "StopKorona!", appli oyo esalemi na Bluetooth mpo na kolanda exposition na bato oyo bakoki kozala na bokono mpe kopesa eyano ya mbangu na bakonzi ya bokolongono .

sourceString: The app was developed by the Ministry of Communication and Technology and Ministry of Health.
targetString: App esalemaki na Minisere ya Communication mpe ya Technologie na Ministere ya Kolongono.
translated: Application yango esalemaki na Ministère ya Communication mpe Technologie mpe Ministère ya Santé.

sourceString: As of 14 April 2020, the app was awaiting approval by the Google Play Store and Apple App Store.
targetString: Na mokolo ya 14 sanza ya minei 2020, application ezalaki kozela endimelo ya Google Play na ya Apple App Store.
translated: Na mokolo ya 14 avril 2020, appli yango ezalaki kozela ndingisa ya Google Play Store mpe Apple App Store.

sourceString: On 12 April, the government stated that the contact tracing app was in an advanced stage of development, and would be available for deployment within weeks.A similar app is planned in Ireland, and in France ("StopCovid").
targetString: Na mokolo ya 12 sanza ya minei, gouvernema elobaki application ya kolandela bato ekomaki mosika, mpe bakokoka kosalela yango na ba poso oyo ezali koyaka. Application mosusu ya boye ezali kosalema na Ireland, mpe na France (‘’StopCovid’’).
translated: Le 12 avril, gouvernement elobaki ete appli ya traçage ya contact ezalaki na étape avancée ya développement, mpe ekozala disponible mpo na déploiement na ba semaines.App ya ndenge wana ekanamaki na Irlande, mpe na France ("StopCovid").

sourceString: Both Australia and New Zealand are considering apps based on Singapore's TraceTogether app and BlueTrace protocol.Russia intends to introduce a geofencing app for patients diagnosed with COVID-19 living in Moscow, designed to ensure they do not leave home.
targetString: Australie na Nouvelle Zealand balingi kosalela application oyo ezali na Singapore TraceTogether mpe BlueTrace protocol. Russie ezali kosala application oyo ekomona bato oyo bazali na COVID-19 oyo bazali kofanda na Moscow, ekosalema mpona kolandela bango mpo ete babima libanda ya ndako te.
translated: Australie mpe Nouvelle-Zélande bazali kotalela ba applis oyo esalemi na appli TraceTogether ya Singapour mpe protocole BlueTrace.Russie ekani kokotisa appli ya géofencing mpo na baye bazwami na COVID-19 oyo bavandi na Moscou, ebongisami mpo na kosala ete babima na ndako te.

sourceString: Ross Anderson, professor of security engineering at Cambridge University, listed a number of potential practical problems with app-based systems, including false positives and the potential lack of effectiveness if takeup of the app is limited to only a small fraction of the population.
targetString: Ross Anderson, molakisi ya securite ya ingenieur na universite ya Cambridge, ayebisaki makambo mingi oyo ekoki kosalema na ba system ya application oyo, lekola bapositives ya lekuta, mpe mpasi mpona etambola malamu mpo ete application ekoki kosalisa kaka bato ndabo ya mboka.
translated: Ross Anderson, profesɛrɛ ya ingénierie ya sécurité na Iniversite ya Cambridge, atángaki mwa ndambo ya mikakatano oyo ekoki kobima na ba systèmes oyo esalemi na ba apps, na ndakisa ba positifs ya lokuta mpe kozanga efficacité oyo ekoki kozala soki kozua appli esuka kaka na mwa ndambo moke ya bato.

sourceString: Addressing concerns about the spread of misleading or harmful "coronavirus" apps, Apple set limits on which types of organizations could add coronavirus-related apps to its App Store, limiting them to only "official" or otherwise reputable organizations.
targetString: Kolandela mitungisi na makambo yo ‘baaplication ya coronavirisi’ ekoki komema, Apple atie limit na baorganization oyo bakoki kotia application na App Store, kosukisa yango kaka na basali ya ‘’gouvernema’’ to baorganization misusu oyo eyebani makasi.
